scripts.deploy: npm run env && npm run prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.env: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)" || echo "Please add the file env.json before deploy."
scripts.prod: test -f prod.json && firebase functions:config:unset prod && firebase functions:config:set prod="$(cat prod.json)" || echo "Please add the file prod.json before deploy."
